description: '''Vispop''' is a music genre which originated from and became popular in the Scandinavian countries in the mid-1960s. The term is derived from the word ''[[Swedish ballad tradition|visa]]'' which denotes traditional and popular [[folk song]] of Sweden. In [[Norway]] the term applied to this type of accompanied singing is ''visesang''. During the 1970s this was among the most popular genres of music in Scandinavia.
